shortDescription: Browsers in Microsoft Edge allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory via a crafted web site, aka "Microsoft Edge Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from those described in CVE-2017-0009, CVE-2017-0011, CVE-2017-0017, and CVE-2017-0065.
vulnerabilityName: Microsoft edge Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
